page.title: 10SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: We asked people from the block how they would like to see thier area improvd. Two answers kept reoccuring; solving the problem of litter, and stopping vandalism. There seem to be two types of litter affecting the area. In the residential area it tends to be that rubbish that has been carelessly thoughtlessly discarded such as food wrappers, empty drink cans etc. On the rural edge of the block there is more deliberate dumping of large items of rubbish. To solve the problem people wanted offenders to be fined heavily more litter bins to be provided and littwardens to patrol the area. Vandalism worries a lot of people and can be mean loss of amenities. Fairway School playground was use as a play area out of school hours. However because of misuse,break-ins,graphtti and broken windows it is now closed.
